description: This Kotlin source file defines a RecyclerView adapter for displaying move history in a chess mobile app. It manages items representing move details such as move number and SAN notation for white and black moves.

classes.name: MoveRow
classes.description: Data class representing a move entry with move number and SAN notation for white and black moves.

classes.name: MoveHistoryAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView adapter for displaying the move history list in the app.

classes.name: VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class encapsulating the views for a move item.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and returns a new ViewHolder by inflating the move item layout.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds move data to the ViewHolder for the given position.
